body.name: MOUNTUP TV Wall Mount for Most 37-82 Inch Flat Curved TVs Fits 16”18”24” Wood Studs, Universal Tilting Wall Mount TV Bracket Up to 120 lbs, Low Profile Saving Space Wall Mount with Max VESA 600x400mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 35 mins
features: Universal TV Mounts - The tilting TV mount is compatible with most 37-82 inches flat screen or curved TVs up to 120 lbs. Fits VESA 150x100mm to 600x400mm mounting patterns. Design for wood studs spacing up to 24 inches. If require the 32 inch wall plate version, please choose to MU0017. NOTE: Please check the VESA, TV weight, wood studs spacing, and possible blocked cable/input for a better experience.
Safe Space: Our low profile TV wall mount holds your TV only 1.5 inches away from the wall for a sleek and modern look. Keep your TV close to the wall to save space and streamline your room.
Tilt TV to Reduce Glare: The flat screen TV wall mount offers a 10° tilting function. Adjust TV easily down 10° to reduce glare for the perfect angle to enjoy any TV show or movie.
Solid Construction: The wall mount TV bracket features a heavy duty cold-formed steel construction. It has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family.

Easy to Install - MOUNTUP TV wall mount comes with clear instructions and all necessary hardware kits for quick 3-step installation. Please note that all our TV mounts can not be installed on drywall alone. Concrete wall anchors will be sent per request (Anchor Size: φ10x50mm).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOUNTUP Tilting TV Wall Mount MOUNTUP TILTING TV WALL MOUNT FOR 37" - 82" TVS Set up your TVs at a perfect viewing angle with this universal tilt TV mount MU0008-LK. The wall mount TV bracket is designed for most 37-82 inches LCD, LED, or Plasma screens and the max weight of 120 lbs TVs, the VESA patterns from 100x100mm to 600x400mm, and the wood studs spacing up to 24 inch.

How to choose a suitable TV mount? Step 1: Check Wall Types The TV mount MU0008 is designed for wood studs spacing of 16/18/24 inches.It also can be mounted on concrete or brick walls. Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed. ( Note： Not for dry wall alone application.) Step 2: Check VESA Pattern VESA=HorizontalxVertical (mm) (The 4 mount holes on TV back)Make sure your TV's VESA pattern is between 100x100mm and 600x400mm.Accommodate VESA patterns: 100x100, 200x100, 200x200, 200x300, 300x200, 300x300, 400x200, 400x300, 400x400, 500x300, 600x400. Step 3: Check TV Specs Confirm your TV's weight is less than 120 lbs.Confirm your TV's size is between 37 and 82 inches. The tv wall mount is compatible with including but not limited to 37, 39, 40, 42, 43, 49, 50, 55, 60, 65, 70, 75, 80, 82 inches TVs.

Why choose this Tilting TV Wall Mount? 1. Heavy-Duty Steel Construction Low profile TV wall mount features heavy-duty cold-formed steel construction. It has been strength tested to ensure security for your TV and your family. 2. Low Profile Design The wall mount TV bracket extends only 1.5 inches from the wall for a sleek appearance to save space. 3. 10° Tilt Adjustment Easily tilt the TV down 10° to reduce glare for comfortable viewing to enjoy any TV show or movie. 4. Unique Quick Release Design The locking system with a quick-release design allows the TV to remove and adjust easily. PACKING LIST: 1 x TV mount, 1 x bubble level, 3 x velcro cable ties, 1x user manual, all standard mounting hardware. NOTE: Concrete anchors are not included, they will be sent if needed. DO NOT MOUNT ON DRYWALL ALONE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great Wall mount and doesn’t budge. Holds up a 65” TV with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and strong!
reviews.reviewText: This mount is really sturdy and strong, and I don’t have any qualms about having my TV up on the wall now that it’s actually up there. It was a little difficult for me to install (as a small, not very handy woman) because you have to mount it in studs, but thankfully I had someone who could come and help me since I couldn’t get through the solid wood lol. The whole pattern thing on the back seemed way more complicated than it actually is, so that’s good. I absolutely love the way our game room looks now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handling my 75” like a boss
reviews.reviewText: If you do the right prep installation should be pretty simple. Comes with a level but recommend to use your own if you have one as the one it comes with is not the best quality. Instructions were pretty clear. Measure everything out and find your studs before starting! Handling my 75” tv without issue. VESA standards made it super easy to figure out with our tv hardware as well, no complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For a wide range of TV sizes
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice TV wall mount. Easy to put together. Feels very sturdy. Mounts the TV really close to the wall which is nice. I had tried another but was not wide enough for my wall studs. This one worked perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for simple mounting needs, hard to beat price
reviews.reviewText: It is a bse mounting bracket to hang even large TV on a wall. Nothing more. Small rage tilt adjustment, no any rotating adjustment, but this what I need. Hanging TV for straight viewing angle. It is sturdy, I used my own tools to install so can't atest to quality of that short water level.5 star rating is within the basic mounts category. This does not measure up to full adjustment range mounts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Setting this up was super easy and my tv looks great on the wall now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy mount at a good price
reviews.reviewText: I picked this mount out, because of it's ability to tilt. I had a TeeVee given to me, and it had 1/2 the wall bracket on it, and no stand. Fortunately I was able to mount it (temp fix, not long term), and I loved the fact that it tilts. So when I was looking for a proper wall bracket for my 42" TeeVee, that would tilt, this bracket jumped out at me from the list. I'm really impressed with the fact that included nearly all the hardware I could need to mount almost anything, and I was able to easily get the base mounted to the wall without issue. You should be able to easily hit any stud spacing you may have in your location, to mount this bracket. I'm happy with this tilting wall bracket, and can recommend it.
